import React from "react"; const ProductsPage = () => { return (

Products

Browse our selection of healthy groceries and supplements

{Array.from({ length: 8 }, (_, i) => (

Product {i + 1}

Healthy product description

$9.99
))}
); }; export default ProductsPage;
